citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:20 pm on
01/15/2016.
A individual at the facility site stated, the owner was at work. I called the phone number provided and no
responsible individual was available for inspection.
